Definition at line 28 of file Champ_implementation_sommet_base.cpp.

References Objet_U::dimension, le_champ(), Field_base::nb_comp(), DoubleVect::size(), Champ_Proto::valeurs(), and value_interpolation().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  int            nb_components = ch_base.nb_comp();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
  assert(result.size() == nb_components);
  assert(position.size() == Objet_U::dimension);
  DoubleTab positions;
  positions = position;
  DoubleTab resu(1, nb_components);
  ArrOfInt polys(1);
  polys(0) = poly;
  value_interpolation(positions,polys,values,resu);
  for (int j=0; j<nb_components; j++)
    result(j) = resu(j, 0) ;
  return result;
}

Definition at line 46 of file Champ_implementation_sommet_base.cpp.

References Objet_U::dimension, le_champ(), Field_base::nb_comp(), DoubleVect::size(), Champ_Proto::valeurs(), and value_interpolation().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
  assert(ncomp>=0);
  assert(ncomp<ch_base.nb_comp());
  assert(position.size() == Objet_U::dimension);
  DoubleTab positions;
  positions = position;
  DoubleTab resu(1, 1);
  ArrOfInt polys(1);
  polys(0) = poly;
  value_interpolation(positions,polys,values,resu,ncomp);
  return resu(0, 0);
}

Reimplemented in Champ_Fonc_P1_base, Champ_Fonc_Q1_base, Champ_Inc_P1_base, and Champ_Inc_Q1_base.

Definition at line 72 of file Champ_implementation_sommet_base.cpp.

References Objet_U::dimension, DoubleTab::dimension(), le_champ(), Field_base::nb_comp(), DoubleVect::size(), IntVect::size(), Champ_Proto::valeurs(), and value_interpolation().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
  int nb_polys = polys.size();

  assert(ncomp>=0);
  assert(ncomp<ch_base.nb_comp());
  assert(result.size() == nb_polys);
  assert(positions.dimension(1) == Objet_U::dimension);
  DoubleTab resu(nb_polys, 1);
  value_interpolation(positions, polys, values, resu);
  for(int i=0; i<nb_polys; i++)
    result(i)=resu(i,0);
  return result;
}
DoubleVect & Champ_implementation_sommet_base::valeur_aux_sommets_compo_impl ( DoubleVect &  result,
int  ncomp 
) const [protected, virtual]

Implements Champ_implementation_base.

Definition at line 121 of file Champ_implementation_sommet_base.cpp.

References DoubleTab::dimension(), le_champ(), Field_base::nb_comp(), DoubleTab::nb_dim(), DoubleVect::size(), and Champ_Proto::valeurs().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
  const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
  int            size          = values.dimension(0);

  assert(ncomp>=0);
  assert(ncomp < ch_base.nb_comp());
  assert(result.size() == size);
  assert(values.nb_dim() == 2);
  assert(values.dimension(1) == ch_base.nb_comp());

  for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
    result(i) = values(i, ncomp);

  return result;
}
DoubleTab & Champ_implementation_sommet_base::valeur_aux_sommets_impl ( DoubleTab &  result) const [protected, virtual]

Implements Champ_implementation_base.

Definition at line 106 of file Champ_implementation_sommet_base.cpp.

References DoubleTab::dimension(), DoubleTab::dimension_tot(), le_champ(), DoubleVect::line_size(), and Champ_Proto::valeurs().

{
  const Champ_base& ch_base = le_champ();
  const DoubleTab&  values = ch_base.valeurs();
  const int size = values.dimension(0), N = values.line_size();

  assert((result.dimension(0) == size) || (result.dimension_tot(0) == size));
  assert(result.line_size() == N);
  for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
    for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
      result(i, n) = values(i, n);

  return result;
}
